definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
Hagia Sophia (the main cathedral of Constantinople, subsequently the major mosque of Istanbul)
pinyin: Sheng4 Suo3 fei1 ya4 da4 jiao4 tang2

sentences.english: Michael orders Krantz to have Sofia released, and he does so.
sentences.chinese: 迈可命令“将军”叫人放了索非亚，他遵照执行了。

sentences.english: Hotel Princesa Sofia offers a variety of Barcelona restaurants and bars.
sentences.chinese: 酒店公主索非亚提供各种巴塞罗那的餐馆和酒吧。

sentences.english: Serrano's 5-year-old daughter, Sofia, has not asked for the Zhu Zhu robotic hamster.
sentences.chinese: 塞拉诺5岁的女儿索非亚没有要珠珠这种电子仓鼠。

sentences.english: A former mayor of Sofia, Mr Borisov revels in micro-management.
sentences.chinese: 博里索夫，索非亚的前任市长，钟情于微观管理。

definition: Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
